name: Hidden Objects - The Journey
description:
Hidden Objects - The Journey is an exciting game that tests your observation skills. In this game, you need to find hidden objects in different scenes and levels. Each level has a unique theme and a list of items to search for.

The game has stunning graphics and realistic sound effects that immerse you in the gameplay. You can play in different modes, such as a relaxed mode where you can enjoy the scenery and take your time or challenge mode with time limits.

The game features hints and bonuses that help you find objects faster. You can earn coins by completing levels and use them to unlock new scenes and levels.

Hidden Objects is an addictive and captivating game that will keep you entertained for hours. Download it now and start your adventure!
